item.description:
Dear Members,

I apologize for not holding a meeting in July and August. A couple members ofmy family were ill and in the hospital frequently, and I got totally distracted by this.

Our next meetup is Sept. 19, 2010, at Holliston Meadows,, 140 Summer St., Holliston,MA.

Please send me your RSVP's. My present emialaddress isn't working too well, so send yourRSVP's to robinberry519@gmail.com, and I will get them.

More later.....

Small dog best,
Kim

group.name: The Boston Maltese and Tiny Dog Meetup Group

item.name: BOSTON MALTESE & TINY DOG MEETUP SUNDAY Sept. 19 - 1 pm to 4 pm
